mil3.7.6:0.3: Question on the Factors for Awakening
mil3.7.6:1.2: “Venerable Nāgasena, how many factors for awakening are there?”
mil3.7.6:1.3: “There are seven factors for awakening, your majesty.”
mil3.7.6:1.4: “By how many of these seven factors for awakening, venerable sir, does one awaken?”
mil3.7.6:1.5: “One awakens by one of these, your majesty, the awakening factor of discrimination of states.”
mil3.7.6:1.6: “Then, venerable sir, why is it that one speaks of seven factors?”
mil3.7.6:1.7: “What do you think, your majesty, if a sword is placed in its sheath and not grasped in the hand is it able to cut what is to be cut?”
mil3.7.6:1.9: “In the same way, your majesty, without the investigation of states awakening factor, one cannot awaken by the other six factors.”
mil3.7.6:3.1: Question on the Factors for Awakening sixth
